lyrics.stanza: Christ's divinity's glorious indeed; 'Twas concealed in Him as in a grain of wheat. While incarnated, He was pressed, constrained For the release of His glory within.
Incorporation! Incorporation— The issue of Christ's glorification. In our daily walk, we must join to Him And must live in Him, and work as one with Him.
Resurrected, Christ thus was born to be God's firstborn Son with humanity. Many sons were through resurrection, born; The Lord Spirit, Christ, their being will transform.
We in faith were regenerated; God and man thus incorporated. This took place through Christ's resurrection. For His divine, glorious multiplication.
Three aspects of incorporation: Father's house for His satisfaction, The true vine for His multiplication, Child of the Spirit, for His move on earth.
